title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 30.1 - Form of certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 30.1 - Form of certificate

State Regulations

The certificate of the chief fiscal officer of a
municipality pursuant to section
25.10
of
the Local Finance Law relating to the issuance of urban renewal notes shall be
in the form shown at Appendix 7 attached hereto and hereby made a part hereof
as fully as if herein set forth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
30.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
